thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text: bought resale tickets 5 days before a concert and had zero problems with them, although 2 days later the venue realised more tickets and I had already spent double the money. So if you're buying tickets really close to the date I recommend waiting to see if the venue releases more, other than that I don't regret buying the tickets off resale and would recommend if you can't find any others
